Wisdom: حُبُّ الْمَالِ سَبَبُ الْفِتَنِ وَحُبُّ الرِّئَاسَةِ رَأْسُ الْمِحَنِ
enWisdom: Love of wealth is the cause of tribulations and love of leadership is the root of tribulations
Love of wealth corrupts the [final] outcome

Wisdom: حُبُّ الْمَالِ يُقَوِّي الْآمَالَ وَيُفْسِدُ الْأَعْمَالَ
enWisdom: Love of wealth strengthens [false] hopes and corrupts actions

Wisdom: حُبُّ الْمَالِ يُوهِنُ الدِّينَ وَيُفْسِدُ الْيَقِينَ
enWisdom: Love of wealth weakens faith and corrupts certitude
